knimeNode.name: XML Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Saves XMLcell's to disk as separate XML documents.

fullDescription.intro: This node writes XML columns to disk as separate files per cell. The filename is chosen based on the configuration settings.
fullDescription.option: The XML column with cells to be saved to files
Lets you control the names of files which the node produces. Each cell will be saved to a separate file. All will be saved to the saved folder location
Specifies the location of the folder
